headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  YARNELL, ROBERTA "BOBBY," AGE 91

snippet: YARNELL--Roberta "Bobby," age 91, passed away after a brief illness on February 16, 2016. Most recently of Rye Brook, NY and Del Ray, FL, she was predeceased by her parents, Dr. Morris and Martha Messenger; her brother, David Messenger, and her beloved husband, Philip, to whom she was married for 67 years. Bobby was the adored mother of Madge Leone of Merrick, NY and Dr. Gary (Laurie) Yarnell of Rye, NY and the cherished grandmother of Jason, Matthew, Nikki, and Adam. In lieu of flowers, donations to a favorite charity are appreciated. 1/3
